questions.question_text:
A company wants to migrate its on-premises data warehouse to AWS. The information in the data warehouse is used to populate analytics dashboards.

Which AWS service should the company use for the data warehouse?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D. Amazon Redshift

Selected Answer: D
D. Amazon Redshift

Selected Answer: D
D is the answer.

Selected Answer: D
D. Amazon Redshift
 
Tens of thousands of customers today rely on Amazon Redshift to analyze exabytes of data and run complex analytical queries, making it a widely used cloud data warehouse. Run and scale analytics in seconds on all your data without having to manage your data warehouse infrastructure.
 
Ref link: https://aws.amazon.com/redshift/#:~:text=to%20Amazon%20Redshift-,Tens%20of%20thousands%20of%20customers%20today%20rely%20on%20Amazon%20Redshift,manage%20your%20data%20warehouse%20infrastructure.

comments.content:
AWS analytics services: 
 
* Interactive analytics. Amazon Athena.
* Big data processing. Amazon EMR.
* Data warehousing. Amazon Redshift.
* Interactive analytics. Amazon Kinesis.
* Operational analytics. Amazon OpenSearch Service.
* Dashboards and visualizations. Amazon Quicksight.
* Visual data preparation. AWS Glue DataBrew.

questions.question_text:
A company wants to use machine learning to identify suspicious activities in its AWS account.

Which AWS service provides this functionality?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Amazon Macie is a security service that uses machine learning to automatically discover, classify, and protect sensitive data in AWS. While it can identify potential security risks by detecting sensitive data in storage, it is not specifically designed for identifying suspicious activities in an AWS account.
On the other hand, Amazon Detective is specifically designed to analyze, investigate, and identify the root cause of security events and suspicious activities in an AWS account. It uses machine learning, statistical analysis, and graph theory to create a visual graph of an account's resources and behaviors, making it easier to identify and investigate potential security threats. Therefore, Amazon Detective is the correct answer for the given question.

Selected Answer: C
https://aws.amazon.com/detective/features/

Selected Answer: C
C. Amazon Detective
"Amazon Detective makes it easier to analyze, investigate, and quickly identify the root cause of potential security issues or suspicious activities. Amazon Detective automatically collects log data from your AWS resources and uses machine learning, statistical analysis, and graph theory to build a linked set of data that enables you to easily conduct faster and more efficient security investigations."
https://aws.amazon.com/detective/faqs/

Selected Answer: C
Amazon Detective is an AWS service that makes it easy to analyze, investigate, and identify the root cause of security events and suspicious activities in an AWS account. It automatically collects log data from AWS services and third-party tools, and uses machine learning, statistical analysis, and graph theory to build a visual representation of the data, making it easier to identify and investigate security issues.

Amazon Macie (option B) is a fully managed data security and privacy service that uses machine learning to discover, classify, and protect sensitive data in AWS.

Selected Answer: C
Amazon Detective
https://aws.amazon.com/detective/

Selected Answer: C
C is the answer.

Selected Answer: C
Amazon Detective automatically collects log data from your AWS resources and uses machine learning (ML), statistical analysis, and graph theory to build a linked dataset that you can use to conduct more efficient security investigations.

https://aws.amazon.com/detective/

Selected Answer: C
B. Amazon Detective
 
This question is referring to AWS accounts, which Amazon Detective analyzes and discovers using ML. Amazon Macie is for sensitive data with regards to S3 buckets.
 
Amazon Macie is a data security service that uses machine learning (ML) and pattern matching to discover and help protect your sensitive data.

choices.C: Performing hardware maintenance in the AWS facilities that run the AWS Cloud
choices.A: Scaling the web application and services developed with Docker
choices.B: Provisioning or scheduling containers to run on clusters and maintain their availability
choices.D: Managing the guest operating system, including updates and security patches

questions.question_text:
A company is hosting a web application in a Docker container on Amazon EC2.

AWS is responsible for which of the following tasks?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Performing hardware maintenance in the AWS facilities that run the AWS Cloud

Selected Answer: C
C. Performing hardware maintenance in the AWS facilities that run the AWS Cloud

"AWS responsibility 'Security of the Cloud' - AWS is responsible for protecting the infrastructure that runs all of the services offered in the AWS Cloud. This infrastructure is composed of the hardware, software, networking, and facilities that run AWS Cloud services."

https://aws.amazon.com/compliance/shared-responsibility-model/

Selected Answer: C
C is the answer.

Selected Answer: BE
B. AWS Online Tech Talks
E. AWS Classroom Training

B.
"AWS Online Tech Talks cover a wide range of topics and expertise levels through technical deep dives, demos, customer examples, and live Q&A with AWS experts. "

https://aws.amazon.com/events/online-tech-talks/?events-master-ott.sort-by=item.additionalFields.startDate&events-master-ott.sort-order=asc&awsf.event-type=*all&awsf.series=*all&awsf.category=*all&awsf.level=*all



E.
"AWS Classroom Training offers live classes with instructors who teach you in-demand cloud skills and best practices using a mix of presentations, discussion, and hands-on labs."
https://aws.amazon.com/training/classroom/

Selected Answer: BE
